TITLE: Ethics Of AI Use
DEF: The moral and social implications of AI systems' use
TASK: The Ethics of AI Use pattern addresses the moral and social implications of AI systems in an educational context. It is essential to ensure responsible AI deployment by carefully considering potential biases, privacy concerns, and fairness. This pattern is crucial because it promotes transparency, accountability, and inclusiveness in AI development and use. Challenges to effective implementation can include a lack of understanding of AI ethics and an underestimation of potential pitfalls. This pattern can work well when educators and technologists work together to create ethical guidelines, foster open discussions about AI ethics, and integrate these principles into AI-enhanced education.
